title: How can I pay for my GCredit dues?
content:

You can pay for your GCredit dues via your GCredit dashboard, Pay Bills, or outside the GCash app via our Payment Partners. Here’s how:

Pay via GCredit Dashboard

1. On your GCredit management page, you can view the breakdown of your dues. Tap **Pay for GCredit**
2. Input the amount you want to repay and tap **Next**
3. Review the amount to be paid. Select **Pay**

You will see a confirmation of your successful GCredit repayment.

Pay via Bills

1. Open the GCash app and tap on **Bills > Fuse Financing Inc.**
2. Enter your Loan Account ID, select **GCredit**, and specify the amount you want to repay. Tap **Next**
3. Review the payment amount and tap **Confirm**

Payments via GCash Bills will reflect within **3 business days.**

Pay via Payment Partners

To pay your GCredit dues through our partners, enter **Fuse Financing Inc.** as the Biller and use your **Account Number** from your GCredit dashboard. Payments made through offline partners will be posted within **1 business day.** Here’s how to make payments with our partners:

|     |     |
| --- | --- |
| **Payment Partner** | **Account Number** |
| [Bank of the Philippine Islands](https://www.bpi.com.ph/personal/bank/digital-banking/payments/pay-bills) | GCredit Account Number |
| [Metrobank](https://www.metrobank.com.ph/services/mbonline/pay-bills-online) |
| [Banco de Oro (BDO)](https://www.bdo.com.ph/support-topics/v-internet-banking-performing-financial-transactions/bills-payment-how-do-i-get) | GCash Registered Mobile Number |
| [Bayad Center](https://www.bayad.com/#bayadcenter) |

Request for GCredit Statement of Account

To request your GCredit Statement of Account, [click here.](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=360000706713&ind=normal&tf_360023219534=gcredit__i_want_to_request_for_a_copy_of_my_soa.) A customer service representative will contact you in **24 hours.**
